programme.title: Mang Jose
programme.desc: Having the ability of energy absorption and redirection, Mang Jose covertly saves people only if they rent him out. One day, Tope rents Mang Jose to help him save his mother who has been abducted by mysterious troopers of King Ina.

programme.title: Baliktaran
programme.desc: A hilarious comedy about a couple switching roles to make their marriage work.

programme.title: Miracle in Cell No. 7
programme.desc: Joselito (Aga Muhlach), an intellectually-disabled man, is wrongfully charged assault and murder. In prison he becomes friends with his fellow inmates and together they form a plan to see his young daughter (Xia Vigor) inside the cell. Years after, his daughter (Bela Padilla) becomes a lawyer and is determined to prove her father's innocence.

programme.title: The Gifted
programme.desc: Childhood best friends who are both geniuses in school eventually become bittersweet rivals for campus athlete Mark Ferrer.

programme.title: Diary ng Panget
programme.desc: Eya (Nadine Lustre) and Cross (James Reid) didn't get along at first, their relationship becomes complicated but soon, they fall in love with each other.

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: Jasmine (Sarah Geronimo) embarks on an unforgettable journey to reunite with her beloved ill grandmother and bring a dog named Happy, which she thinks will help her fully recover.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Real Life Fiction
programme.desc: An actor with an illustrious career decides to write, direct, and act in a film that will inevitably bring him closer to his own demise before revealing that his truth may actually be far from what he has become.

programme.title: Hindi Tayo Pwede
programme.desc: Gabby (Lovi Poe) finds love in a man who is also named Gabby (Tony Labrusca) and shares a long and deep friendship with Dennis (Marco Gumabao).

programme.title: Para Kang Papa Mo
programme.desc: In the vibrant 1990s Philippines, the infectious trend of village-level dance contests echoes through communities. Young talents Anton, Ric, and Jose are at the heart of it. Yet, envy lurks in the shadows, a malicious force conspiring to dismantle their dreams.

programme.title: Boy Golden
programme.desc: The leader of a notorious gang is released from prison. He is on the lookout for the rival gang leader who is responsible for his imprisonment and also the rape and murder of his sister. He plots and executes revenge with the help of his friends.

programme.title: Mauban: Ang Resiko
programme.desc: A family in Cagbalete Island ekes out their living through wine-making, fishing and charcoal-making. A daily fare, resiko treat has become a threat to the family's fight for survival.

programme.title: Walang Kapalit
programme.desc: A marriage gone sour with the husband leaving the wife, taking along a minor daughter and lying to her about her mother. Meanwhile, each carries a relationship with other parties. Deciding to forego their annulment case, they commit to give their marriage a second try.

programme.title: Bell Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a Thai ghost story of Kuman Thong, the film revolves around a woman who has caused the death of her young brother a long time ago. When she returns to the old house where they lived before, she finds herself haunted by the spirit of her young brother wanting to take revenge for his death.

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimerâ€™s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughterâ€™s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to beginâ€¦

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: After a car accident erases his memory, Wang Ren Jie takes on a job as a night guard. As the clock strikes midnight, he reports for duty at the abandoned building, only to find three lost souls awaiting him, and unravels a revenge plot at the same time. Is this fate or a curse cast by vengeful spirits?

programme.title: The Windmill Massacre
programme.desc: Jennifer joins a tour to explore the renowned windmills of the Netherlands. As their tour coach breaks down on the way, they seek refuge in a creepy shed near a sinister windmill with a dark history. When some tour members suddenly disappear, Jennifer discovers a shared secret among them, linking their fates in a chilling revelation.

programme.title: WaningÂ Moon
programme.desc: Nuanchan is a famous and highly respected spiritual medium in a rural village in Thailand. She wants to train her niece, Ploy, to succeed her and Ploy needs to remain a virgin. When Ploy falls in love with her childhood friend Tul, their lives are in danger as the secret of the spiritual world is being unveiled.

programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Chapter 1 Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Artiste Yin Qing enters Hell's Gate through a supernatural TV show and reunites with her late friend Mei Qi. At Mei Qi's gravesite, Yin Qing encounters Mei Qi's husband, Dong Sheng, and a series of mysterious incidents unfold. She then brings Dong Sheng onto the show, where Mei Qi exposes his infidelity and reveals the conspiracy behind her death.

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Ober Da Bakod The Movie

It does not start well, as they all ended up in an island where they meet the natives and have problems with the bad guys.

programme.title: Murders on the Frioul Islands
programme.desc: When a renowned editor is found dead on stage during a play, young Captain Victor Mariani is put in charge of the case. But tensions rise and secrets surface when his father Pierre, a retired commissioner and old friend of the victim, joins the case.

programme.title: The Uninvited Guest
programme.desc: In this suspense thriller, Felix, an architect, lets a stranger into his home to use his phone. When the man suddenly disappears inside the house, Felix finds himself in in a cat and mouse chase and his house becomes a maze.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ghosts Of The Past
programme.desc: Ex-gang leader Degen escapes prison after 19 years, putting inspector Sarah Kohr and prosecutor Anton Mehringer in danger. Unable to count on the authorities without risking their secrets, they must confront their pasts when Degen kidnaps Anton's son.

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Golden Fish
programme.desc: A popular Physics teacher is found dead following an experiment gone wrong. Could his death merely be an accident or could it have been a result of foul play? Things become more complicated when a rumour of a teacher-student affair surfaces.

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump
programme.desc: When Grump's wife dies, he sees no reason to live on. But just as his coffin is finished, Grump gets a new spark and a major secret! His teenage granddaughter is in trouble and needs help and wisdom from her grandfather, and the warmth of his fireplace.

programme.title: Temporaries
programme.desc: Ariane gets a job as an interpreter at a food plant after moving back to the Richelieu Valley following a breakup. There, she finds herself torn between obeying the harsh demands of her boss and standing up for the exploited migrant workers she befriends.

programme.title: Natatorium
programme.desc: Lilja stays with her estranged grandparents while she auditions for a performance group. When her dad and aunt find out, a sense of panic arises. Dark secrets emerge from the household that threaten to destroy her future career and her life.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ghost Lights
programme.desc: In a post-pandemic Europe, conspiracy theorist Felix Morgenroth becomes obsessed with exposing the "coronavirus lie." Convinced that physicians Carsten and Lisa Kippmann were behind the conspiracy, Felix seeks retribution through a devastating explosion.

programme.title: Looking For Jacques
programme.desc: Based on a book and an original TV series from the 80s, Carina is a journalist digging into the disappearance of Jacques, a successful author. She is desperate for a juicy story to land a great job but the more she finds out, the less she wants to share.

programme.title: What's for Dinner, Mom?
programme.desc: Sisters Tae and Yo return to their childhood home and discover a box of recipes and letters from their late Japanese mother. As Tae uncovers her motherâ€™s hidden struggles, she journeys to Taiwan to retrace her past through memory and food.

programme.title: The Treasure
programme.desc: Dao Luat and her ex, Tu Cong, embark on a treasure hunt in a cursed mountain. Within the cave system, the line between reality and illusion blurs as they confront twisted versions of each other while time seems to fall apart.

programme.title: La La La at Rock Bottom
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Shigeo loses his memory in a brutal attack. Taken in by Kasumi, he becomes the lead singer of a band and lives a new life- until memories of his dark past begin to return.

programme.title: Love At First Fight
programme.desc: Between his friends and the family business, Arnaud's summer looks set to be a peaceful one. Peaceful until he runs into Madeleine, as beautiful as she is brusque, a concrete block of tensed muscles and doomsday prophecies.
